title: Once upon a forest [DVD]
creator_credit: Charles Grosvenor, Jerry Mills, David Kirschner, HTV Cymbu Wales, Zotic Fox and Hanna-Barbera Productions
brief_description: Dapplewood is a magical place. One day three Furling friends, Abagail the wood mouse, Edgar the mole and Russell the hedgehog find their lives seriously disrupted. A chemical spill threatens Dapplewood and their young friend Michelle becomes seriously ill from the toxic fumes. The three friends use the skills they learned from their teacher Cornelius and embark on an exciting journey to find help for their friend. From the famous Hanna-Barbera studios.
